roleset.name: do the conga
roleset.note: CONGA-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from conga.01-v)

roles.note: Partner as direct object is not a cooperator, use comitative for that (from conga.01-v)

role.descr: Feet, partner, etc. made to dance/move

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He congas the dance ray right off the side of the building, thus defeating evil by dancing.
example.arg: right off the side of the building

example.name: With partner
example.text: My father is a gentleman and he congas with the best of them.
